item.title: By: Andy "Dementia" Harris
item.dc:creator: Andy "Dementia" Harris
item.description: <p>Microsoft have been doing that for years. Remember the big thing they made of Win95 and its "multitasking" capability. OS2 had been doing that for years. The irony there of course is that Microsoft co-developed OS2 with IBM in the beginning (that is a story for another time) so you would think they would know that.</p>
item.content:encoded: Microsoft have been doing that for years. Remember the big thing they made of Win95 and its “multitasking” capability. OS2 had been doing that for years. The irony there of course is that Microsoft co-developed OS2 with IBM in the beginning (that is a story for another time) so you would think they would know that.
